name: Edge Therapeutics
overview:
Edge is a private, hospital-focused specialty pharmaceutical company that transforms proven, FDA-approved drugs into targeted, locally delivered therapies that address unmet acute neurological conditions. Edge has four hospital-focused orphan drugs based on drug delivery platform technology that provides for targeted, site specific delivery of off-patent drugs. Edge has offices in New Providence, NJ and Toronto, Canada.

Edge was founded under the belief that site-specific, sustained-release delivery of medicine directly to the site of brain injury will prevent certain delayed complications, improve patient outcomes, and decrease overall healthcare costs. By transforming established medicines, Edge streamlines the clinical development path and drastically reduces risk and costs. Edge’s lead products, NimoGel and NimoVent, will enter clinical trials in 2012 and could ultimately achieve annual U.S. sales exceeding $1B.

Edge has four hospital products with eight different applications, all locally delivering known active agents with its microparticle platform technology. These products have strong pricing and reimbursement positions, and require small clinical trial numbers. NimoGel and NimoVent, Edge’s lead products, will be entering clinical trials in 2012.

Edge offers a unique business opportunity for investors to extract an attractive multiple on their investment. Edge has an experienced management team including a world-renowned expert on brain hemorrhage.

funding_rounds.source_description: Edge Therapeutics Raises $18M in Series C Financing
